name: py-medusa
description: Medusa is a fork of SickRage that automates the downloading and organization of TV shows. It integrates with usenet and torrent clients to fetch episodes, rename files, and manage libraries.
features: Automatic downloads: Monitor for new TV episodes and automatically download when available.
Usenet and torrent: Support for both usenet and torrent download clients with multiple provider options.
Quality profiles: Define preferred video quality and automatically upgrade episodes when better versions appear.
Show tracking: Track multiple TV series with automatic episode detection and scheduling.
Failed download handling: Automatically retry failed downloads or search for alternative sources.
Subtitle downloads: Automatically fetch subtitles in multiple languages for downloaded episodes.
File renaming: Organize downloaded files with customizable naming patterns and folder structures.
Calendar view: See upcoming episodes and air dates in a visual calendar interface.
Notification system: Receive alerts when new episodes are downloaded via email, Slack, or other services.
Backlog management: Search for and download missing episodes from past seasons.
API integration: Connect with Kodi, Plex, or other media centers for library updates.
Multi-language support: Interface available in multiple languages for international users.
